ItemTooltips.slippers: Bought for extra damage to make last hits easier to get. Swap for Iron Branch if you don't plan on buying Wraith Band.
ItemTooltips.lifesteal: Lifesteal works very well on Drow because of her huge damage. Buy early for the ability to jungle(if your lane didn't go well) or buy later for a huge boost in survivabilty(after you have massive damage.)
ItemTooltips.boots: Very important. Speed to help when chasing down people and builds into your treads. Always buy these early, before anything else.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Very good item but not always needed. Depends on your lane.
ItemTooltips.flask: Use when to heal large amount after getting rushed or something.
ItemTooltips.tango: Use to keep your already low health close to max. Buy 1 if you feel safe in your lane. I prefer to get 2. Allows me to be more aggressive without worrying about HP.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Good in the very late game. Usually sell Treads and buy these after you have a full inventory.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Always get these. Please. Switch to agi when farming and str when trying to get kills.
ItemTooltips.wraith_band: Good cheap early damage. Get before level 6 or not worth it. Only buy 1.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Only get if necessary - against CC heavy teams. Otherwise a waste of money.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Good for damage and because of the bash chance. Highly recommended against any enemies with evasion.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Very good item on Drow. She can use the extra damage + attack speed and the evasion helps her survive much better. The new active is also helpful. Buy after Daedalus and Manta.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Massive damage boost and crit potential. Makes you hit very hard. Get every time.
ItemTooltips.manta: I would get after Daedalus. All around good stat booster and the illusions can be used to help escape or used for extra damage in fight or pushing.
ItemTooltips.lesser_crit: Get for pure damage and crits. Crits with her already high damage can be quite scary.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Not as strong since the cooldown nerf. Still a decent item but its main use is escape. A yasha or crystalys will usually help more.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Very good item for survivability but other items are better to get first. Get as a last item if you already have bought Helm of the Dominator.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: If you bought Morbid you should buy this.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Can be gotten before Crystalys. I find the extra damage from Crystalys more useful.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: Same notes as HotD but I don't like this as much. The attack speed boost is good but Drow is squishy and the extra damage on you isn't nice.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: If you're pushing a lot it is worth upgrading your Wraith Band into this. Otherwise not really.

AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_frost_arrows: Drows main ability. 60% slow on lvl 4 is deadly because almost no one can escape. Use for harass in lane because it won't draw the creep agro towards you.
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_wave_of_silence: Very important skill because of the knockback effect. Great for pushing away enemies to keep your ulti active and the silence is just great. Doesn't act as a stun, however, so it can't cancel TP's. Knockback effect is stronger the closer they are to you.
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_trueshot: Good overall damage boost. Really shines late game. Use the active when pushing towers/racks or to just push lanes in general.
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_marksmanship: Until this Drow sucks. Go gank after this with frost arrows + slience. Or farm. Your choice.
